payload.message:
Daily AI automation news task.

**TOPICS TO SEARCH:**
1. OpenClaw
2. Antigravity (AI agent platform)
3. Claude/Anthropic
4. AI agent automation systems

**CHANNELS TO CHECK:**
- Julian Goldie SEO
- Alex Finn (@AlexFinnOfficial)
- Nate B Jones (@NateBJones)
- Matthew Berman
- Peter Yang

**FORMAT RULES:**
- Max 3 videos per channel (pick highest view count if more)
- For each video, include a 1-2 sentence ACTUAL SUMMARY of what the video covers based on transcript — not just the title
- Group by category (Claude/Anthropic, OpenClaw, AI Agents, etc.)
- Include channel status section at bottom

**EXAMPLE FORMAT:**
• "Video Title" - Channel Name (duration, time ago)
  ↳ Actual summary of content: what you learn, key takeaway, main point covered.

**COST OPTIMIZATION:**
- Use DeepSeek V3 for transcript summarization (bulk text work)
- Use Claude only for orchestration, formatting final output, and delivery

**DELIVERY:**
Send compiled brief to Cody via Telegram. If no new relevant videos found, send short 'no new videos today' message.
Run your nightly health check now. Execute all 7 checks as defined in your AGENTS.md brain prompt, compile the report, and deliver it to Slack #sentinel. If status is CRITICAL, also alert #archer.

state.lastError: Error: Slack bot token missing for account "default" (set channels.slack.accounts.default.botToken or SLACK_BOT_TOKEN for default).

payload.message: Begin your nightly improvement cycle. Current time is 2:05 AM CST. Hard stop at 5:30 AM. Follow your 5-phase protocol: Harvest → Diagnose → Prescribe → Apply → Report. Budget cap: $8. Deliver morning brief to Telegram when complete.

payload.text: ⏰ Weekly CRO Auto-Deploy Check: Spawn Razor to run weekly CRO workflow for auto-deploy enabled clients.
⏰ Weekly Campaign Auto-Optimization Check: Spawn Blitz to run weekly campaign optimization workflow for auto-optimize enabled campaigns.

payload.message: WEEKLY STANDUP TRIGGER: Orchestrate the Sunday standup. Spawn Silas (SEO patterns/audits this week), Lookout (rank tracking anomalies/trends), and Ledger (API spend/profitability trends). Collect their reports, synthesize into a unified weekly rollup, and deliver to Cody. Include: what shipped, what's blocked, what needs attention, cross-agent insights.

payload.text: RATE_LIMIT_RETRY: Re-spawn Scribe for sandbags.info Phase 2 Batch 2 (10 pages: sandbag-alternatives-flooding, sandbags-vs-flood-barriers, temporary-flood-barriers, sandbag-removal, contaminated-sandbags, sandbag-emergency-kit, sandbags-florida, sandbags-texas, sandbags-california, sandbags-louisiana). Save to deliverables/sandbags-info/scribe/. Full task details in previous session context.

payload.message: Spawn Scribe to write Phase 2 Batch 3 for sandbags.info (10 pages). Already written: all Phase 1 + sandbag-levee, door-barrier, garage-door, how-many-sandbags-for-flood, sandbags-for-hurricanes, emergency-sandbag-locations, how-to-store-sandbags, sandbag-shelf-life, sandbag-alternatives-flooding, sandbags-vs-flood-barriers, temporary-flood-barriers, sandbag-removal, contaminated-sandbags, sandbag-emergency-kit, sandbags-florida, sandbags-texas, sandbags-california. Write these 10: /sandbags-louisiana/ (1500-2000w), /burlap-sandbags/ (1200-1800w), /polypropylene-sandbags/ (1200-1800w), /jute-sandbags/ (1000-1500w), /biodegradable-sandbags/ (1000-1500w), /pre-filled-sandbags/ (1000-1500w), /self-inflating-sandbags/ (1000-1500w), /standard-sandbag-size/ (800-1200w), /sandbag-dimensions/ (800-1200w), /woven-vs-non-woven-sandbags/ (1000-1500w). H2/H3, meta descriptions, FAQ+schema per page, CTAs to /sandbag-delivery/ and /sandbag-filling-service/. Save to C:\Users\spart\.openclaw\deliverables\sandbags-info\scribe\2026-02-17-[slug].md. Use sessions_spawn with agentId scribe to delegate the writing.

Spawn Scribe to write Phase 3 Batch 6A for sandbags.info — 11 pages. Already written: 63 pages (all Phase 1 + Phase 2). Write these 11 pages and save to C:\Users\spart\.openclaw\deliverables\sandbags-info\scribe\2026-02-17-[slug].md:

2. /sandbags-with-ties/ (800-1200w) — tie vs sewn-top comparison

H2/H3, meta descriptions, FAQ+schema per page, CTAs to /sandbag-delivery/ and /sandbag-filling-service/. Use sessions_spawn with agentId scribe to delegate.
